comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-GB; rv:1.9.2.24) Gecko/20111103 Firefox/3.6.24
Build ID: 20111103063747

Steps to reproduce:

Have logged in to that url and clicked some links(This is a tamil news website), many unwanted web sites are popping up which irritates.
http://www.dinamalar.com/News_Detail.asp?Id=351037.

Have checked Pop up blocker is enabled.



Actual results:

Have logged in to that url and clicked some links(This is a tamil news website), many unwanted web sites are popping up which irritates.
http://www.dinamalar.com/News_Detail.asp?Id=351037.

Have checked Pop up blocker is enabled. Have checked with some other websites where the pop up blocker works okay.
Have also tried the above website in Chrome, which blocks the pop ups properly.



Expected results:

When Pop up blocker is enabled, no other websites should pop up while clicking any links in the web site.
